page.title: 06Traffic.
page.content:
We went outside by the 'phone booth and did a traffic survey. There were mainly buses and cars because during the summer there are tourists and visitors. There were also two tractors because there is a farm nearby.
In half an hour lots of cars came past. There were 180 in total. The most popular colour was red, 46 cars and then white, 28 cars.
We also collected the registration numbers and when we came back into school we sorted them into sets with the same year letter, the most common letter was 'T'. We also counted 13 cars with Somerset registration letters YA, YB, YC or YD.
